name: 纳米激素增伤
description: 纳米激素状态下造成的所有伤害+1
code: function executeSkill(context) { if (!context.sourcePiece) { return { message: '没有来源棋子', success: false }; } let hasNanoBoost = false; if (context.sourcePiece.statusTags) { for (let i = 0; i < context.sourcePiece.statusTags.length; i++) { const tag = context.sourcePiece.statusTags[i]; if (typeof tag === 'object' && tag.type === 'nano-boost') { hasNanoBoost = true; break; } if (typeof tag === 'string' && tag.includes('nano-boost')) { hasNanoBoost = true; break; } } } if (hasNanoBoost && context.damage) { const boostedDamage = context.damage + 1; return { message: context.sourcePiece.name + '的纳米激素使伤害+1', success: true, damage: boostedDamage }; } return { message: '目标未处于纳米激素状态', success: false }; }
